Comment: Do whatever you can to make the average American not paying that much attention uncomfortable with what is happening. We need to make Americans uncomfortable and the uncertainty tariffs create is a fantastic opportunity. Don't just worry about the increased costs, worry about the prospects of our allies seeking new partners. Will we be able to get those partners back in the future? Is this the beginning of the Great American Economic Slide? You should probably also worry about how Trump has made every Republican a servant of his and they control all chambers of congress, so no one will stop him. We want Americans that have never payed attention before to be hyper engaged.
